name: forecast
caption: Forecast

effect.short: Changes []{pokemon:castform}'s type and form to match the [weather]{mechanic:weather}.
effect.full:
During [rain]{mechanic:rain}, [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}, or [hail]{mechanic:hail}, this Pokémon's type changes to []{type:water}, []{type:fire}, or []{type:ice}, respectively, and its form changes to match.

This ability has no effect for any Pokémon other than []{pokemon:castform}.

If the [weather]{mechanic:weather} ends or becomes anything that does not trigger this ability, or a Pokémon with []{ability:air-lock} or []{ability:cloud-nine} enters battle, this Pokémon's type and form revert to their default.  If this ability is lost or disabled, this Pokémon cannot change its current type and form until it regains its ability.

flavorText:
The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change
its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.
